name: Bezos Shopping Spree
description:
Can you spend as much money as Jeff Bezos earns in 1 minute?  You can try!

On Amazon's worst day on the stock market, Jeff Bezos still would have made an average of $87,500 in a single minute if he sold his stock. Is it possible to spend that much money as fast as he earns it? Maybe***!!!

This game was showcased at the Exploratorium in San Francisco for their Afterdark: Let's Play! For more info:

https://www.exploratorium.edu/visit/calendar/after-dark-march-21-2019-0

The prices of each item may or may not reflect their actual price on Amazon.com, but for the most part they do. 

Hit 'esc' to quit program.
